approach_recommendations.engage: Since Bennett is an absentee landowner, reach out via written correspondence emphasizing how the project will preserve or enhance his property’s value and involve minimal hassle for non-resident owners.

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach West through a personal visit or phone call to introduce the project and listen to any concerns, building trust since he has no known public position.
